@kittenlove,

If one file you used was a RAR, and one file was an EXE, that's the problem.

I created the EXE files so there would not be any hassle about extraction/activation.

If you DL'd this version of German, then all you need to do is DL this:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7272499/Rosetta_Stone_v3.4.7_Preinstalled.exe
and extract it you should end up with the file structure shown below.

C:/Program Files(x86)/Rosetta Stone/Rosetta Stone v3
and move ALL of the program files there (about 122mb)

C:/Program Files(x86)/Rosetta Stone/content, 
and all the language files go there (about 1.5 GB)

C:/ProgramData/Rosetta Stone
there should be two xml files, DynamicStoredPaths.xml, and Products.xml

Let me know...
